name: GameDev LiTuber Simulator
description:
3D Simulation game where you play as a Game Developer as well as a Youtuber.

Develop games and make youtube videos as good as possible so that you become famous and get audiences, then publish your game

In making games, you will be assisted by beautiful girls who are experts in making games and editing videos.

There is also a very interesting story to follow.

You can decorate your game studio as beautifully as you can and assemble your PC freely.
